page.title: 17Uppermill 4
page.content: Most{entertainment and recreation}in Uppermill is self-organised, there being no commercial cinemas or discos.{Outdoor activities}occupy a large part of many people's leisure time - as do the many local pubs! There is a successful male voice choir, a musical society and a stage society. There are many opportunities for {sport,}both in private clubs and public facilities.Cricket, football, tennis, squash, badminton, bowling and swimming are available in Uppermill, with sailing at nearby Dovestone Reservoir. {Brass bands}also provide much entertainment for both participants and audiences, with each of the local villages having their own band, the most successful being Dobcross Band and Boarshurst Band.
